verses.name: 2 Samuel 9:3
verses.text: And the king said, Is there not yet any of the house of Saul, that I may shew the kindness of God unto him? And Ziba said unto the king, Jonathan hath yet a son, which is lame on his feet.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 9:4
verses.text: And the king said unto him, Where is he? And Ziba said unto the king, Behold, he is in the house of Machir, the son of Ammiel, in Lo–debar.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 9:5
verses.text: Then king David sent, and fetched him out of the house of Machir, the son of Ammiel, from Lo–debar.
